keyboardShortcuts.getRepresentation.shortDescription: Get the textual representation of a keyboard shortcut.
keyboardShortcuts.getRepresentation.longDescription: For example, the default copy command would become `Ctrl + C`.

params.name: keyCode
params.description: String-based key code of main key in shortcut.

params.name: ctrl
params.description: Whether the Ctrl key is being pressed in the shortcut. Default: `false`.

params.name: alt
params.description: Whether the Alt key is being pressed in the shortcut. Default: `false`.

params.name: shift
params.description: Whether the Shift key is being pressed in the shortcut. Default: `false`.

keyboardShortcuts.init.shortDescription: Initialise events so that keyboard shortcuts can be detected.

keyboardShortcuts.handleEvent.shortDescription: Handle the event as a keyboard shortcut.

keyboardShortcuts.handleShortcut.shortDescription: Handle the key combination specified as a shortcut action.

return.description: Whether the keyboard shortcut is still uncaptured.

params.name: keyCode
params.description: String-based key code of main key in shortcut.

params.name: ctrl
params.description: Whether the Ctrl key is being pressed in the shortcut. Default: `false`.

params.name: alt
params.description: Whether the Alt key is being pressed in the shortcut. Default: `false`.

params.name: shift
params.description: Whether the Shift key is being pressed in the shortcut. Default: `false`.
